Sentencas: H2/H2O-power-to-gas-to-power (H2/H2O-P2G2P) systems that produce H2 by water electrolysis and generate electricity from this H2 are promising large-capacity electric energy storage systems for the extensive installation of renewable energy sources.
Titulo: Carbon/air secondary battery system and demonstration of its charge-discharge

Sentencas: However, such systems require complex thermal management and must be sufficiently large to improve the utilization of waste heat for higher system efficiency.
Titulo: Carbon/air secondary battery system and demonstration of its charge-discharge

Sentencas: Here we propose a carbon/air secondary battery (CASB) system that uses a C/CO2 redox reaction with potentially higher volumetric energy density and system efficiency than those of H2/H2O-P2G2P systems.
Titulo: Carbon/air secondary battery system and demonstration of its charge-discharge

Sentencas: The CASB system is an electric energy storage system that combines CO2 electrolysis for C charging and power generation of carbon fuel cells.
Titulo: Carbon/air secondary battery system and demonstration of its charge-discharge

Sentencas: For the first time, repetitive power generation (10 charge-discharge cycles) of the CASB system with Boudouard equilibrium is demonstrated without degradation.
Titulo: Carbon/air secondary battery system and demonstration of its charge-discharge

Sentencas: This system achieves maximum Coulombic efficiency of 84%, charge-discharge efficiency of 38%, and power density of 80 mW cm-2 at 800 degrees C and 100 mA cm-2.
Titulo: Carbon/air secondary battery system and demonstration of its charge-discharge
